name: Serebii Clean Blue
description: This is a currently unfinished reskin of Serebii.net. The skin features starker contrasts in addition to a marginally less busy experience. The right-hand side div has been hidden on the Index as well.
additional_info:
Update 1:
Changed some colouring
Changed logo
Removed redundant code

Update 2:
Added header background
Small visual changes

Update 3:
Changed dropdown background colour. Blue was a bit... much I feel.
Small changes
